item.description:
Meet at the Winslow State Park in Wilmot, NH. Hike is a fairly easy hike of approx. 3 miles round trip. However, plan on adding an additional 2 miles to hike the road that may be closed off up into the park. We can hike up the Barlow Trail to do a loop down the Winslow trail or up and back on the Barlow Trail. Can be decided once we are at the park. Be prepared for windy conditions. Micro-spikes might be needed.
http://www.nhstateparks.org/uploads/pdf/KearsargeHikingMap_Web.pdf
If anyone is interested we can partake in refreshments at The Flying Goose Brew Pub and Grill after the hike.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Kearsarge South
